column4: The Welcome Back screen is shown.

The Ether balance is shown on the overview.
The wallet address is shown on the overview.
The selected network is Ethereum Mainnet.

column2: Switch networks to a test network.
column4:
Toggle 'Show test networks' in settings if needed.
Switch network via network selector to Sepolia.
The Sepolia balance is shown on the overview.
The wallet address is shown on the overview.
The selected network is Sepolia.

column2: Open the test dapp in another tab.

column4: Request encryption public key notification screen is shown.

column2: Proceed to confirm get encryption key in notification window.
column4: The encryption key is displayed on testdapp page.

column2: On testdapp encrypt/decrypt section enter message and click "Encrypt".
Paste copied encrypted message and click "Decrypt".
